body:
Smash to Smithereens fails to target an animated Inkmoth Nexus, but works on other artifacts.
I found this out when trying to add Liquimetal Coating.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Permanent that becomes an artifact can't be targeted by spells that target artifacts

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 86ffcd1d5b8b .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Thanks! Now I can try how the AI handles Liquimetal Coating.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/) on October 04, 2011 22:05:31_

Smash to Smithereens fails to target an animated Inkmoth Nexus, but works on other artifacts.
I found this out when trying to add Liquimetal Coating.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=69_
